original_text:
But the Lord has strengthened Rezin’s foes against them
    and has spurred their enemies on.
korean_text: 그러므로 여호와께서 르신의 대적들을 일으켜 그를 치게 하시며 그의 원수들을 격동시키시리니

sentences.original_text: But the Lord has strengthened Rezin's foes
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 주님은 레신의 대적들을 강하게 하셨으며

sentences.original_text: and has spurred their enemies on
